about: QIKPDF is designed with absolute privacy and performance in mind. This application operates entirely within your web browser. No files are ever uploaded to any external servers, and no data is stored beyond your local session. There is absolutely no tracking, no analytics, and no telemetry. We believe in privacy by default. By utilizing modern web technologies like WebAssembly and client-side JavaScript, QIKPDF delivers blazing-fast 100% local processing. This means your sensitive documents never leave your device, ensuring maximum security assurance for personal, corporate, or confidential files. Terms of use: This tool is provided as-is without any warranties. Users are responsible for the files they process.

tools.imageToPdf: Convert one or multiple image files (JPEG, PNG) into a single PDF document. You can drag and drop multiple images, reorder them using the built-in drag handle interface, and merge them into a standardized PDF format with original quality preserved.
tools.merge: Combine multiple PDF files into a single continuous document. Select or drop your PDF files in the desired order. The tool will append them sequentially and output a new merged PDF, without compromising text searchability or image quality.
tools.split: Extract every single page of a multi-page PDF document into individual, separate PDF files. The tool processes the original file and provides a neatly packaged ZIP archive containing all the newly split pages.
tools.rotate: Rotate all pages in a PDF document clockwise by 90 degrees. This is particularly useful for scanned documents or pages that are stuck in the wrong orientation. Processing is lossless and retains the original formatting.
tools.pdfToImages: Extract every page of your PDF and convert it into high-quality PNG images. The tool intelligently renders the PDF pages at a high resolution and zips them together into a single downloadable archive for your convenience.
